reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable, soft even after multiple washes, and well-fitting, with one customer noting the adjustable waist on the shorts. The pajamas are classy enough for daytime wear, maintain their appearance after washing, and are appropriately sized. Customers appreciate the material, with one mentioning it's perfect for summer, and consider them high-quality for the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars They’re soft, comfortable and worth the money.
items.body: I really love the fit and how soft these are. They wash and wear easily. Have had several months and they’re as good as new. Would buy again! Read more
items.author: Karen Nelson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and Super Soft!
items.body: Love these pjs! Soft and comfortable. I wanted to move away from novelty pjs and these are great. Sizing is right on. Washes up nicely. Hang or lay flat to dry only - that’s the only bummer. I would buy more sets if their were more dark colors available. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: CaliGirlForever

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy, & cute pj's!
items.body: These PJ's are so soft & comfortable, not necessarily what you would expect with such a great price! They are really cute too! Read more
items.author: Joan E. Miller

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty PJ's
items.body: Soft and comfortable, pretty. Fits well. Appears well made. Read more
items.author: melissa patrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy !
items.body: Oh my gosh, these are the softest most comfortable PJs I have ever worn. I’d probably could’ve gone down a size, but I was afraid I didn’t want them tight, but they’re so comfortable and a lightweight material. Read more
items.author: Maria Patino

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, fits to size and washes up well
items.body: I have ordered several Ekouaer PJ sets for my mother to give as gifts. The material is extremely soft, washes up well and holds its shape and colors. My mother loves them, especially since the top does not have a collar. Read more
items.author: slmroadrunner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these comfy pajamas
items.body: I love these pajamas. They’re roomy, soft and thick enough for a mom of 4 boys to walk around without “things” being visible through them. They’ve held up well. I have 4 pair now. Nice prints and coloring. I buy a size up. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort is where it's at!
items.body: Comfort Comfort Comfort!!!!! This set is so comfortable and relaxing to wear. The fabric is light without being clingy. If the fit is relaxed not too tight and it's true to form. I like the color and the convenience of putting something on and being able to do daily chores or just sitting and reading a good book. I highly recommend this lounging pajama set. Read more
items.author: Susan Brooks

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Grey Stars, Teddy-tye Die, Army Green, Black, Dark Gray, Black Flower, Teddy-pink Moon, Grey Owl, Teddy-apricot Cherry, Light Blue Flower, Blue Flower, Black Star Sky, Black Leopard, Light Gary Stars. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
